amendatorysection.catchline: Aging Nebraskans Task Force; report; Department of Health and Human Services; report.
amendatorysection.para: On or before December 15, 2014, the Aging Nebraskans Task Force shall present electronically to the Legislature a report of recommendations for the statewide strategic plan described in section 68-1107. The Department of Health and Human Services shall also annually report electronically to the Legislature the percentage growth of medicaid spending for people over sixty-five years of age for no fewer than five years following acceptance of the application to the State Balancing Incentive Payments Program pursuant to section 81-3138.
